Returns: The singleton instance of the MIME-type map.

ClassDesc: Two-way map that maps MIME-types to file extensions and vice versa. See also @B_java#net#URLConnection#guessContentTypeFromName_E@ and @B_java#net#URLConnection#guessContentTypeFromStream_E@. This class and URLConnection share the same MIME-type database.
